tools.name: CxGLearner  V1
tools.description-en: An advanced parser for construction grammar analysis. Supports multiple languages and provides detailed syntactic and semantic annotations.

tools.name: Construction Visualizer
tools.description-en: Interactive visualization tool for exploring construction networks and relationships between grammatical patterns.
tools.description-zh: 用于探索构式网络和语法模式之间关系的交互式可视化工具。

tools.name: Grammar Induction Toolkit
tools.description-en: Comprehensive toolkit for unsupervised grammar induction from large text corpora.
tools.description-zh: 从大型文本语料库中进行无监督语法归纳的综合工具包。

tools.name: Pattern Extractor
tools.description-en: Extracts grammatical patterns and constructions from raw text using unsupervised methods.
tools.description-zh: 使用无监督方法从原始文本中提取语法模式和构式。

ASE 1.0.name: ASE-GPT Medium
ASE 1.0.description-en: Medium-sized language model trained on ASE corpus with 350M parameters.
ASE 1.0.description-zh: 在ASE语料库上训练的中等规模语言模型，参数为3.5亿。

ASE 1.0.name: ASE-BERT Base
ASE 1.0.description-en: BERT model pre-trained on ASE corpus with construction grammar annotations.
ASE 1.0.description-zh: 在ASE语料库上预训练的BERT模型，包含构式语法注释。

ASE 1.0.name: Construction Annotations
ASE 1.0.description-en: Dataset of 1.2M sentences annotated with construction grammar patterns.
ASE 1.0.description-zh: 包含120万句子的数据集，带有构式语法模式注释。

ASE 1.0.name: ASE-GPT Large
ASE 1.0.description-en: Large language model trained on ASE corpus with 1.2B parameters.
ASE 1.0.description-zh: 在ASE语料库上训练的大型语言模型，参数为12亿。

MultiLang CxG 2.1.name: English Constructions
MultiLang CxG 2.1.description-en: Comprehensive inventory of English constructions with usage examples.
MultiLang CxG 2.1.description-zh: 包含用法示例的英语构式综合库。

MultiLang CxG 2.1.name: Chinese Constructions
MultiLang CxG 2.1.description-en: Collection of Chinese grammatical constructions with semantic annotations.
MultiLang CxG 2.1.description-zh: 带有语义注释的中文语法构式集合。

MultiLang CxG 2.1.name: German Constructions
MultiLang CxG 2.1.description-en: German grammatical patterns with frequency and distribution data.
MultiLang CxG 2.1.description-zh: 包含频率和分布数据的德语语法模式。

CxG-Bench.name: Evaluation Suite
CxG-Bench.description-en: Benchmark for evaluating construction grammar models across multiple tasks.
CxG-Bench.description-zh: 用于评估构式语法模型在多个任务上表现的基准。

CxG-Bench.name: Model Comparisons
CxG-Bench.description-en: Performance comparisons of various models on CxG-Bench tasks.
CxG-Bench.description-zh: 各种模型在CxG-Bench任务上的性能比较。
